text: If I use `inline_rich_text` in a repeating module, the resulting code includes duplicate element IDs. Any way to fix that?
Id remove the  {% inline_rich_text%} portion and just use the {{item.story_text}} with a wrapping div
Perfect! I was just using the code as generated by the Design Manager - this solution removes the unnecessary wrapping divs too. Thanks!
is there a way to sort blog listings to go by order of a specific blog tag loading first then the rest of the blogs?
